item.title: iOS Data Persistence: The Big Picture
item.description: We’ve all been there. Do a search on the topic of “saving data in iOS” and you’ll get dozens of search results mentioning at least six different frameworks and platforms, and a monthâ€™s worth of reading. Wouldn’t it be nice to distill the possibilities down into just what you need in order to start down a path for persisting data in your app? “iOS Data Persistence: The Big Picture” will be worth the hour of your time.
